X=aY+b, then E[X|Y=y]=E[aY+b|Y=y]=ay+b, so g(y)=ay+b, or E[X|Y]=aY+b, which is a function of Y.

. This says that the variance of X ⩾ average variance of X if we know something about Y.  This means
